name: Love Pyramid
description:
--- Developed in 48 hours for Jam Nation June 2016 ---

Love Pyramid is a competitive two player game inspired by Act 3 in the classic opera Aida. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aida

General Radames (P1) of Egypt wants to elope with his beloved Princess Aida of Ethiopia, but he is obstructed by the Pharoah (P2), who wants Radames to marry his daughter instead. Avoid the Pharoah's traps and escape with Aida before the Pharoah's guards capture him!

Radames (P1):

Goal: Reach Aida before the timer runs out to win!

Controls:

- WASD or arrow keys to move.

- Space bar to dash.

Pharoah (P2):

Goal: Prevent Radames from reaching Aida before the timer runs out.

Controls:

- Left Click to place traps!

Traps

- Pyramids and other bricks: Temporarily blocks the path

- Sphinx: Charges forward in a direction, stunning Radames.

- Crocodile: Explodes after a short delay, sending Radames flying!
